content: designed with hand dyed yarn in mind the stitch pattern really picks up on those pretty pops of color i know i m not the only one with random single skeins of yarn in my stash you ve got em too they called to you in the store whispered to you in that shop update and then they just sat waiting for their moment *this* is it my friends the perfect project for that single skein of fingering weight yarn you ve been hanging on to crocheters can use fancy fingering weight yarn too it has just the right amount of shaping to hug around your neck and will keep a springtime breeze out - just the right thickness to keep you warm but not sweltering with just one skein and a couple not-so-fancy tricks you ll be able to whip up this cozy cowl in no time *********** ~the pattern requires advanced beginner knowledge of crochet techniques & is written in standard us terminology tutorial links included in pattern skill level advanced beginner finished measurements 20 circumference at top of neck 26 circumference at bottom of neck 10 tall finished measurements are taken after blocking to ensure correct sizing please complete a gauge swatch main materials required one skein/443 yds of fingering weight yarn once upon a corgi yarn in that s no moon g/4 0 mm crochet hook f/3 75 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle removable stitch marker *i also offer the one skein wonder cowl in dk weight- see my shop for that pattern i would love to see your one skein wonder cowl lite follow along with me on instagram -
